questionData.passage: It is _______ for students to submit their assignments by Friday morning.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子說明學生必須在週五早上提交作業。選項 D「mandatory」意為強制性的、必須履行的，最符合語境。選項 A「optional」意為可選的，選項 B「suggested」意為被建議的，選項 C「voluntary」意為自願的，這三個詞都表示非必須的或自願的，與句子中「必須提交」的意思不符。
「expand」意為擴展、擴大。公司計劃將業務擴展到亞洲市場，因此選項 B 正確。選項 A「condense」意為濃縮；選項 C「shrink」意為縮小；選項 D「restrict」意為限制，這些選項都不符合語境。
questionData.passage: The company is planning to _______ its operations into the Asian market next year.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 「exhausted」意為筋疲力盡的、極度疲倦的。連續工作十小時後，她感到筋疲力盡，需要休息，因此選項 C 正確。選項 A「energetic」意為精力充沛的；選項 B「refreshed」意為精神煥發的；選項 D「stimulated」意為受到刺激的，這些選項都不符合語境。
questionData.passage: After working for ten hours straight, she felt completely _______ and needed a long rest.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 「conclusive」意為決定性的、確鑿的。在法庭上提出的證據不夠確鑿，無法說服陪審團被告有罪，因此選項 C 正確。選項 A「ambiguous」意為模稜兩可的；選項 B「trivial」意為瑣碎的；選項 D「preliminary」意為初步的，這些選項都不符合語境。
questionData.passage: The evidence presented in court was not _______ enough to convince the jury of the defendant's guilt.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
